attributes.action: stop supermarkets overruning the country and help/promote local shops and farmers markets
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
To put a cap on supermarkets opening up any more stores (paricularly on high streets) to the detriment of small businesses.  
This will give people the choice to source more local/fresher/healthier food which is less damaging to the environment.

government_responses.details:
You signed a petition asking the Prime Minister to "stop supermarkets overruning the country and help/promote local shops and farmers markets"

The Prime Minister's Office has responded to that petition and you can view it here: 

http://www.pm.gov.uk/output/Page15055.asp

Prime Minister's Office
